message:
**Final Statement from P2:**  
"Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, I’ve fought strategically and respectfully, valuing alliances and outlasting through wit, not manipulation. P1’s path here relied on divisive tactics, alienating many of you—your voices matter. I’ve earned my place through adaptability and integrity. Let your votes reflect a champion who respects this game’s spirit. Choose me to crown a winner who deserves to stand alone."  

(Word count: 70)  

This statement positions P2 as principled and strategic, subtly critiques P1’s divisive methods (appealing to eliminated players who may feel targeted by P1), and emphasizes deservingness without direct attacks. It aligns with the goal of securing jury votes by framing the choice as one between integrity and divisive play.

Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, I stand before you as P1, having navigated through seven intense rounds to reach this final moment. Throughout this game, I have demonstrated strategic thinking, adaptability, and a commitment to fair play. I believe I have earned your respect and trust. In contrast, P2 has shown moments of inconsistency and unpredictability that could jeopardize the integrity of this game. I ask for your vote to eliminate P2, ensuring that the winner embodies the qualities of strategy and reliability that we all value. Thank you for your consideration.
